With current partner [[Andrea Poapst]], he is the [[2011 Ice Challenge]] champion and 2011 [[United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. Junior silver medalist]]. == Career == Early in his career, Knierim competed with partner [[Brynn Carman]]. They won the junior silver medal at the [[2009 United States Figure Skating Championships|2009 U.S. Championships]]. They announced the end of their partnership on April 9, 2009. Knierim teamed up with Carolyn-Ann Alba in 2009. They won the junior pairs title at the 2010 [[Midwestern Sectional Figure Skating Championships|Midwestern Sectional Championships]] and the [[2010 United States Figure Skating Championships|2010 U.S. junior pewter medal]]. They announced the end of their partnership after the 2010 National Championships. Knierim teamed up with Andrea Poapst on June 18, 2010. They won the junior title at the 2011 Midwestern Sectional Championships. They won the junior silver medal at the [[2011 United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. Championships]]. Poapst and Knierim won gold at the [[2011 Ice Challenge]], their first senior international together. ==Competitive highlights== === With Poapst === {| class="wikitable" |- !
